text: Kasone, ki [saroitu imkonoti] izdivoc nadorand, ʙojad pokdomani pesa kunand, to Alloh taolo ononro az ʙaxsisi xes ʙenijoz namojad. Va ʙardagone, ki xostori ʙozxarid [va ozodii xes] hastand, agar dar onon [tavonoii pardoxti mol va] soistagi meʙined, [darxostasonro] ʙipazired va az sarvate, ki Alloh taolo ʙa sumo ato kardaast, cize ʙa onon ʙaxsed [to ʙa ozodiason kumak kuned]. Hamcunin, kanizonatonro, ki mexohand pokdoman ʙosand, ʙa zino vodor nakuned, to ʙahrai [nociz] zindagii dunjoro ʙa dast ovared va agar kase, ki ononro [ʙa in kor] vorid namojad, Alloh taolo pas az macʙur sudanason, hatman, [nisʙat ʙa onon] omurzanda [va] mehruʙon ast
